mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_name AS "userName", a.user_password AS "userPassword", a.phone AS "phone", a.adress AS "adress", a.email AS "email", a.born AS "born", a.sex AS "sex", a.img AS "img", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.create_user_id AS "createUserId", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.update_user_id AS "updateUserId", a.is_disable AS "isDisable", b.id AS "department.id", b.department_name AS "department.departmentName", b.sort AS "department.sort", b.remarks AS "department.remarks", b.create_time AS "department.createTime", b.create_user_id AS "department.createUserId", b.update_time AS "department.updateTime", b.update_user_id AS "department.updateUserId", b.is_disable AS "department.isDisable"
LEFT JOIN sys_department b ON b.id =a.department_id
